snippet: Some band managers say the ticket-seller is enforcing archaic rules that make it more difficult for them to interact with, and make money from, fans.
abstract: Ticketmaster is unveiling new rules for VIP packages and fan club ticket sales, but encounters headwinds from managers who protest limited number of tickets their artists can offer fan clubs; distribution to clubs has become an important source of income and fan interaction for artists.
lead_paragraph: Some band managers say the ticket-seller is enforcing archaic rules that make it more difficult for them to interact with, and make money from, fans.

headline.main: Bands and Ticketmaster Wrangle Over Rules for Fan Club Sales
headline.print_headline: Managers Say Ticketmaster Hinders Bands’ Fan Services
